resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106615</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106615</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric Field of Dreams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisch Fangen Sie von den Träumen 
auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ électrique des rêves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo elétrico dos sonhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campo elettrico dei sogni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό πεδίο των ονείρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo eléctrico de sueños</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Play ball! Add charges to the Field of Dreams and see how they react to the electric field. Turn on a background electric field and adjust the direction and magnitude. (Kevin Costner not included).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie Kugel! Fügen Sie Ladungen 
auffangene von Träumen hinzu und sehen Sie, wie sie zum 
elektrischen auffangen reagieren. Drehen Sie an einen 
Hintergrund elektrisch auffangen und justieren die Richtung 
und die Größe. (Kevin Costner nicht eingeschlossen).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boule de jeu ! Ajoutez les frais à la zone 
des rêves et voyez comment ils réagissent au champ électrique. 
Allumez un champ électrique de fond et ajustez la direction et 
la grandeur. (Kevin Costner non inclus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esfera do jogo! Adicione cargas ao campo dos
sonhos e veja como reagem ao campo elétrico. Gire sobre um 
campo elétrico do fundo e ajuste o sentido e o valor. (Kevin 
Costner não incluído).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sfera del gioco! Aggiunga le spese al campo 
dei sogni e veda come reagiscono al campo elettrico. Accenda un 
campo elettrico della priorità bassa e registri il senso e la 
grandezza. (Kevin Costner non incluso).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφαίρα παιχνιδιοΰ Προσθέστε τις δαπάνες στο 
πεδίο των ονείρων και δείτε πώς αντιδρούν στο 
ηλεκτρικό πεδίο. Η στροφή σε ένα ηλεκτρικό πεδίο 
υποβάθρου και ρυθμίζει την κατεύθυνση και το μέγεθος. 
(Θ*Κεβην Costner συμπεριλαμβανόμενο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Bola del juego! Agregue las cargas al campo
de sueños y vea cómo reaccionan al campo eléctrico. Gire un 
campo eléctrico del fondo y ajuste la dirección y la magnitud. 
(Kevin Costner no incluido).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106615</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/electric-field-of-dreams</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
